F R E E W A R E  C O N T R O L   P A N E L
     
  This control panel is used for performing all of the administrative actions for the bulletin board. Only authorized users can change control panel options.  
     
  Use the links on the left side to perform all of the administrative tasks available. There are directions with each control panel option.
